MCMC Line Painting Art Generation

mcmcArt-package.Rd

Generate artistic line paintings using Reversible Jump MCMC algorithms. Creates beautiful line-based artwork from target images through iterative optimization of line parameters.

Details

Package:mcmcArt
Type:Package
Version:0.1.0
License:MIT + file LICENSE

The package provides functions to:

  • Load and resize target images

  • Run MCMC algorithms to generate line paintings

  • Save intermediate results and final artwork

  • View and manipulate generated images

Key functions:

  • run_line_painter: Main function to generate line paintings

  • load_image_rgb: Load and resize images

  • save_png: Save images to PNG format

  • view_rgb: Display RGB arrays as images

Author

David Hodgson <david@example.com>

References

Reversible Jump MCMC algorithms for line-based artwork generation.

Contents

Developed by David Hodgson.
